title: EUNE chat is not working
body: I know you guys dont care about Eune region but can you guys plz fix the chat all region cant talk thx!

replies.body: Are you still having issues connecting to chat, or has this been resolved by now?

I think there was some issue yesterday on EUNE. You can keep an eye on server status pages when something abnormal happens:
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune
https://twitter.com/status_lol
